title: Number of homicides in Sweden 2008 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of homicides, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2012 to 2008.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
But, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2017 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2014 to 2013.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the number of confirmed homicides in Sweden from 2008 to 2018 . The number of homicides has fluctuated in this period . In 2017 , the number stood at 113 homicides which was relatively high considering the whole 10-year period .
